dct_title_s: Pierhead and bulkhead lines for the westerly shore of the Upper Bay New York Harbor - Clifton S.I. to Hudson River - including the northeast shore of Staten Island, N.Y., Jersey Flats and Ellis Island, N.J.
dct_description_sm: Map depicts pierhead and bulkhead lines established by Secretary of War, approved to supersede all maps of harbor lines previously approved by the localities. Placement of lines is marked from the referenced monuments at the various locations- around Staten Island, Bayonne, Jersey City, Ellis Island, etc.; map also shows railroad lines.
